successes.title: Petcube — stay closer to your pet
successes.description: Watch, talk and play laser games with your furry friends through the mobile app anytime, anywhere. Now pre-order at www.petcube.com.

Pledges.description: WE LOVE YOU BACK — We’ll send all our love with project updates to keep you up to speed, as well as a personal thank you via our website.
FAN PACK — Become a proud owner of the Petcube branded eco friendly handbag. Make your support visible and wearable. Free shipping to the continental US.
EARLY PUGS SPECIAL — For the fastest and the most dedicated supporters. Get a Petcube and save $100 from expected $199 retail price. Free shipping to the continental US.
KICKSTARTER SPECIAL — Only for the beloved Kickstarter crowd. Get a Petcube and save $50 from expected $199 retail price. Right here, right now! Free shipping to the continental US.

CHIC PICK — Fashion alert. A Petcube comes with a cute furry skin of your choice to keep it fresh and trendy. As usual, Kickstarter backers save $50 from expetcted $229 retail price. Free shipping to the continental US.

OVERDRESS — There's always some space for extra awesomeness. A Petcube plus 2 skins of your choice equals eternal happiness for fashionistas. Save $60 from expected $259 retail price. Free shipping to the continental US.

SUPER FAN — Do you have ideas about using another toy instead of a laser pointer? Or integrating Petcube with another mobile app? Or building an augmented reality game on top of our existing experience? Receive our exclusive mailing list for early developers to be the first to know where we're heading. Reserve a unique username in the Petcube app before the launch rush. Of course, you will also get a Petcube with 2 skins of your choice when it's available for the general release on May, 2014. Whether you are a developer or just a pet lover, by choosing this pledge, you support our upcoming features.

PARTNER WITH US — Let's start a dialogue on how we can work together. You will receive exclusive updates for partners and we will consult with you on our development roadmap and our next features. You'll be invited to an individual workshop meeting with the founders in San Francisco (travel and accommodations not included), to work on the future improvements for Petcube and the ways the gadget integrates with other pet accessories, devices and services.
And of course, you will get a Petcube with 2 skins of your choice and a personal engraving
when they are available for general release on May, 2014.
